line.words: Il viaggio a scuola Da Sophie Milla

subtitle.line: Turen til skoleAf Sophie Mills
Journey to School By Sophie Mills
Journey to School By Sophie Mills
Op weg naar schooldoor Sophie Mills

line.words: Quando vado a scuola qualcuno mi segue.

subtitle.line: Når jeg går i skole, er der nogen, der følger efter mig.
When I go to school someone follows me.
When I go to school someone follows me.
Als ik naar school ga word ik door iemand gevolgd.

line.words: Passo davanti ad un caffè, un parco, un cinema e qualcuno mi segue.

subtitle.line: Jeg kommer forbi en café, en park og en biograf, og nogen følger efter mig.
I pass in front of a café, a park and a cinema, and someone follows me.
I pass in front of a café, a park and a cinema, and someone follows me.
Ik kom langs een café, een park en een bioscoop, maar iemand volgt me.

line.words: Giro a destra dopo il negozio, a sinistra al ufficio postale e davanti a me c’è un fiume, e qualcuno mi segue.

subtitle.line: Jeg drejer til højre ved en forretning, til venstre ved posthuset, og foran mig er der en flod, og nogen følger efter mig.
I turn right by a shop, left at the post office and in front of me there is a river, and someone follows me.
I turn right by a shop, left at the post office and in front of me there is a river, and someone follows me.
Ik sla rechtsaf bij een winkel, linksaf bij het postkantoor en recht voor me zie ik een rivier, maar iemand volgt me.

line.words: Attraverso il passaggio pedonale opposto al museo vicino alla chiesa dietro la scuola, e qualcuno mi segue.

subtitle.line: Jeg går over fodgængerfeltet overfor museet ved siden af kirken bag ved skolen, og nogen følger efter mig.
I cross the pedestrian crossing opposite the museum next to the church behind the school, and someone follows me.
I cross the pedestrian crossing opposite the museum next to the church behind the school, and someone follows me.
Ik steek het zebrapad over tegenover het museum naast de kerk achter school, maar iemand volgt me.

line.words: Vado a piedi con i miei amici vicino alla stazione. Vanno in treno o in autobus o in tassi. Continuo a piedi – da sola – e qualcuno mi segue.

subtitle.line: Jeg går sammen med mine venner nede ved banegården. De kommer med tog eller bus eller taxi. Jeg fortsætter alene til fods, og nogen følger efter mig.
I walk with my friends near to the train station. They go by train or by bus or by taxi. I continue on foot - by myself - and someone follows me.
I walk with my friends near to the train station. They go by train or by bus or by taxi. I continue on foot - by myself - and someone follows me.
Ik loop met mijn vrienden vlakbij het treinstation. Zij gaan met de trein of met de bus of met de taxi. Ik blijf lopen in mijn eentje, maar iemand volgt me.

line.words: Diritto, all’angolo, lontano da casa mi volto indietro. “Ciao, micio” dico. Ti porto a casa. Domani vado in autobus.

subtitle.line: Lige ud, på hjørnet, langt hjemmefra, vender jeg mig om. “Hej misser”, siger jeg. Jeg må hellere gå hjem med dig. I morgen tager jeg nok bussen.
Straight ahead, on the corner, far from home I turn around. “Hello puss,” I say. I better take you home. Tomorrow I think I am going to go by bus.
Straight ahead, on the corner, far from home I turn around. “Hello puss,” I say. I better take you home. Tomorrow I think I am going to go by bus.
Rechtdoor, op de hoek, ver van huis, draai ik me om. “Hoi poes”, zeg ik. Ik kan je maar beter mee naar huis nemen. Ik denk dat ik morgen met de bus ga.
